title: Innovative Ophthalmology Medical Education Design: Online-Based Advanced Course

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Self-directed learning environment utilizing personal learning devices, with project-based assessments reinforcing practical competencies

learning_goals: Learners can explain the pathogenesis, diagnostic criteria, and treatment principles of major ophthalmic diseases with 90% accuracy.
Learners can perform ophthalmic examination skills (intraocular pressure measurement, fundus examination, etc.) using virtual simulation tools with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can develop and present ophthalmic treatment plans for actual clinical cases through multidisciplinary team-based projects.
Learners can create patient education materials using digital resources (3D eye models, video databases).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
